subject: Sales
title: The Puppy Dog Close
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Puppy Dog Close.

hook.text: Take the puppy home for the weekend. If you don't love it, bring it back. Nobody brings it back.

buildup.text: The puppy dog close lets customers try before they commit. Possession creates emotional attachment.

discovery.text: It exploits the endowment effect. Once people hold something, returning it feels like a genuine loss.

twist.text: Software companies adopted this: free trials, freemium tiers, and thirty-day money-back guarantees.

climax.text: Let buyers experience ownership. The product sells itself once it's part of their daily life.

punchline.text: Let them hold it. They won't give it back.

quiz.question: What psychological effect does the puppy dog close leverage?
